Special Days

Soror Lacus A summer full moon in which the tides are especially high. "The Sister Lake moon". Water and healing magics are particularly strong during this full moon. Nox's Chaotic Aura triggered Rider's ability to transform during the morning of Soror Lacus. ref

Year 280 A Celestial Convergence above the Nexus conceals the city in a manner that protects the Clandestine Providence. The Convergence started with the stars aligning three nights prior, then the Aurora Borealis above the city the following night. The third night a glimmering dome of magical energy encompassed the city and protects it from human intervention. While it does not prevent humans from coming and going or living among the supernatural, it creates an unease feeling with in those who do not sense the occult naturally (or unnaturally) and most tend to leave. There was a small exodus of mundanes, but it was surpassed by the influx of other humans seeking the prosperity of Everlight once the supernatural were able to create a life more sustaining to their own.
